headline.main: HITLER SEES BORIS ON BULGARIAN HELP; More Troops Demanded of King for Defense on Black Sea and Aegean, Berne Hears SOFIA WARNS OF 'TRIALS' Vigilance on Coast Increased -- Berlin Puts Mysterious Air on Balkan Moves

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, April 2 -- It was announced in Sofia tonight that Adolf Hitler received King Boris at his field headquarters for a long conversation on Wednesday. Details of the talk are lacking, but in usually well-informed circles in the Bulgarian capital it is an open secret that the King has been called upon to make "important decisions" linking the fate of Bulgaria more closely with that of the Axis.
